verbs.description: repentance in the patristicsrepentance in the patristics in our series on the patristic writings [ARG1: we] [V: return] [ARG4: to 2 clement 8 - 9] our series uses for its text michael holmes the apostolic fathers what 2 clement about it an exhortation to faithfulness to the way of christ in the face of threats like gnosticism false teachers and rebellion against leaders i reads like a repentance patristics michael holmes clement
